input.sentences: the groom and bride were elated .
they were n't the only ones .
output.sentences: The groom was elated to see his beautiful bride.
He spoke his vows of love to her.
He kissed her joyously, knowing that she was his beautiful bride.
Saying goodbye to her parents brought tears, and joy all mixed together.
This would be the first day of a new family, and new tears and joy. What a joyous celebration!
